name: viewless
content:
viewless adjective
(INVISIBLE)
Add to word list
Add to word list
literary not able to be seen: Invisible hands stretch out; viewless fingers draw near. The trees in the orchard were shaken by viewless hands and the fruit thrown down. Synonym
invisible
More examplesFewer examplesThe mournful sound came over viewless expanses of field and forest.He pursued the viewless path through the trackless woods.

viewless adjective
(HAVING NO VIEW)
If a place is viewless, you cannot see anything from there, or you cannot see anything attractive from there: Book early for a room with a view - some budget viewless rooms are also available.
